  • RecognitionSettings

    The settings associated with a Speech to Text recognition request. Any nil parameters will use a default value provided by the Watson Speech to Text service.

    For more information about the Speech to Text service parameters, visit: https://console.bluemix.net/docs/services/speech-to-text/input.html

    See more

    Declaration

    Swift

    public struct RecognitionSettings : Encodable
